info.title: Schema of Azure Key Vault events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Key Vault events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

KeyVaultCertificateNewVersionCreatedEven.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an CertificateNewVersionCreated event.

id.description: The id of the object that triggered this event.

vaultName.description: Key vault name of the object that triggered this event.

objectType.description: The type of the object that triggered this event

objectName.description: The name of the object that triggered this event

version.description: The version of the object that triggered this event

nbf.description: Not before date of the object that triggered this event

exp.description: The expiration date of the object that triggered this event
